dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3096589U] Trademark Misappropriation
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: The URL in question is currently not accessible as of 9:01:07 a.m. (GMT-6) on February 19, 2007. Legal Response Team -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Friday, February 16, 2007 4:42 AM To: Copyright Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3096589U] Trademark Misappropriation ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Trademark Misappropriation Added by system at Thursday, Feb 15 2007 04:17 pm X-MailFrom: Libby.Hill@xango.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Thu Feb 15 16:17:12 2007 Received: (qmail 10860 invoked by alias); 15 Feb 2007 22:17:12 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 10857 invoked from network); 15 Feb 2007 22:17:12 -0000 Received: from smtp02.theplanet.com (70.87.6.111) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 15 Feb 2007 22:17:12 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Thu, 15 Feb 2007 16:17:12 -0600 Return-path: Delivery-date: Thu, 15 Feb 2007 16:17:12 -0600 Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from Libby.Hill@xango.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HHoud-0007iw-Vo for abuse@theplanet.com; Thu, 15 Feb 2007 16:17:12 -0600 Received: from mail.xango.net ([67.128.38.15] helo=xmailfe01.xango.net) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from Libby.Hill@xango.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1HHouW-000CYX-ED for abuse@theplanet.com; Thu, 15 Feb 2007 16:17:04 -0600 Received: from xmail01.xango.net ([10.200.0.15]) by xmailfe01.xango.net with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Thu, 15 Feb 2007 15:17:01 -0700 X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft Exchange V6.5 Content-class: urn:content-classes:message MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----_=_NextPart_001_01C7514F.03BC028F" Subject: Trademark Misappropriation Date: Thu, 15 Feb 2007 15:17:01 -0700 Message-ID: <0FBB3D088ADF0F45A0696C2F3A1F6CDA048C1D20@xmail01.xango.net> X-MS-Has-Attach: X-MS-TNEF-Correlator: Thread-Topic: Trademark Misappropriation Thread-Index: AcdRTwNbzAGBCbajRl+yunetedQ+Lg== From: "Libby Hill" To: Cc: X-OriginalArrivalTime: 15 Feb 2007 22:17:01.0731 (UTC) FILETIME=[04277730:01C7514F] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) February 15, 2007 VIA E-MAIL: lzappaco@direct.ca Original to Follow Via Registered Mail Paul Warnett Luie Zappacosta Zapp Worx Design #205A - 318 Homer Street Vancouver BC V6B 2V2 CANADA Re: Trademark Misappropriation Our File: 10394 Dear Sirs: It has come to our attention that you are engaged in a business enterprise that is unlawfully misappropriating our corporate trademark. Consequently, we demand that you immediately cease and desist from any and all uses of the XanGo® trademark. Specifically, your domain name www.xangoforlife.ca is clearly an attempt to capitalize on the goodwill of our XanGo® trademark and profit from the power of our trademark as a source identifier. It is obvious that you are attempting to confuse consumers about the source of your website while promoting a business unrelated to XanGo, LLC. Please be advised that we have protectable rights in the XanGo® trademark and your actions violate a number of United States laws, including but not limited to Section 43 of the Lanham Act, 15 U.S.C. §1125. As you may know, violations of the Lanham Act entitle the holder of a mark to recover the infringer's profits, any damages sustained by the holder of the mark, as well as the costs of the litigation. By copy of this letter to ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc., we are notifying them of your attempt to disparage our trademark through the above-listed site. Your use of the XANGO® trademark is unauthorized and we have a good faith belief that any continued misuse of this mark is likely to cause confusion, to cause mistake, or to deceive. We determined their involvement in this matter by running a trace route on the above web address which yielded an IP address of 70.85.195.242. It is our understanding that ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. maintains the net block 70.84.0.0 - 70.87.255.255. Accordingly, we demand that you immediately cease and desist your trademark misappropriations. Please respond to this demand no later than ten business days after the date noted above. If you fail to do so within ten days, we will be forced to take legal action to protect our rights, including disabling all access to the above infringing and illegal web page. Any inaction or failure to respond on your part will be a factor when we consider our next course of action in this matter. If you have any questions, you may contact me at libby.hill@xango.net. Sincerely, XANGO, LLC Libby Hill Legal Department cc: ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. (abuse@theplanet.com) MIME element (text/html)

February 15, 2007

 

VIA E-MAIL: lzappaco@direct.ca

Original to Follow Via Registered Mail

 

Paul Warnett

Luie Zappacosta

Zapp Worx Design

#205A – 318 Homer Street

Vancouver BC V6B 2V2

CANADA
